lines: Yunji wamnjira pa chipata kwambula kuchedwa,
Kukalawa vya uchindami kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?
Kwenda m'miseu ya golide kuwona vyakukondwereska
Kukarya chiphikiro m'chanya kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?
Ndipo wamupokera mphumphu kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?
Wamwona Fumu ya 'chindami visuzgo vya charu vyamala,
Nakukhala nayo kwandanda kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?
Mazgu gharm'ti "ntha nkhukumanya" kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?
Wamchema ntha wampulikikwa chijalo cham wa chakujala,
Njombe yituwa ntha wampoka kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?
Wam'kwimba pamo na watuwa kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?
Wamjowa m'uchindami kura kasi ndiwe kasi ndine?
